channel.title: 码 链 - mnmlist
channel.description: 每个人眼中，都是不同的世界 –柯宝！!

item.title: mnmlist
item.description:
This is the mnmlist theme adapted for Pelican.

Settings

There's one additional setting used by this theme, if present:

HIDE_DATE = False

If HIDE_DATE is set to True, dates won't be displayed under the blog post titles.

Compass

The main.css file is generated from the compass/src/main.scss sass …
